items.headline: ‘I’m at a crossroads’: I have $35K left on my mortgage at 3% interest. Do I dip into my $700K IRA to pay it off?
items.summary_en: “Over the last year, my two retirement accounts averaged a 15% gain.”

items.headline: Credit-card stocks are slumping. But analysts say a 10% rate cap is far from a done deal.
items.summary_en: A 10% cap on interest rates could mean a big hit to card companies’ earnings. But a Jefferies analyst says it’s “highly unlikely” that Trump gets his way.

items.headline: Singer Lily Allen and ‘Stranger Things’ star David Harbour cut price of Brooklyn townhouse amid split
items.summary_en: Lily Allen and actor David Harbour have cut $695,000 from the price of their Brooklyn townhouse—just over 2 months after the estranged couple listed it amid their acrimonious divorce.

items.headline: Here’s your chance to rent tennis champ Novak Djokovic’s luxury penthouse in Serbia
items.summary_en: Tennis fans can now lounge at Novak Djokovic’s sprawling Serbian retirement home for an eye-watering sum of $17,542 a night.

items.headline: U.S. stock futures sink after Powell accuses Trump of intimidation over DOJ probe
items.summary_en: With earnings season about to kick off, U.S. stock futures slipped Sunday, after the Dow and S&P 500 closed Friday at record highs.

items.headline: Trump says he’s ‘inclined to keep Exxon out’ of Venezuela after CEO’s skepticism
items.summary_en: President Donald Trump on Sunday threatened to exclude Exxon Mobil from any oil deals in Venezuela, after the oil giant apparently didn’t display enough enthusiasm during a Friday meeting at the White House.

items.headline: Powell says criminal investigation by Trump’s Justice Department threatens Fed’s independence
items.summary_en: The Justice Department served the Federal Reserve with grand jury subpoenas on Friday, Fed Chair Jerome Powell said Sunday, threatening an “unprecedented” criminal indictment against him over cost overruns for the renovation of the Fed’s headquarters building.

items.headline: Allegiant to buy rival budget airline Sun Country for around $1.5 billion
items.summary_en: Budget air carriers Allegiant and Sun Country Airlines will merge, the companies said Sunday, the latest move toward consolidation in a heavily competitive industry.
